Posts.Content: Good Morning Ladies! I just wanted to say hi. I am new to this forum,I am a eight year warrior. Stage 4 HER2+++ with liver mets. Anyone else? With liver mets? MarshaB[/b]
Posts.Signature: I am 48 years old, Had a 9cm tumor, with 17 postive nodes, Satge 3 Grade 3. 12 months of chemo, radiation, tamoxfin,7-24-96 Liver mets in 5-2003 stage 4 HER2 +++ Hercipten, taxcol, comb. So far so good!
